price: Sema: Nani anaye kulindeni usiku na mchana na Arrahmani Mwingi wa Rehema? Bali wao wanapuuza kumkumbuka Mola wao Mlezi.
arabic: قُلۡ مَن يَكۡلَؤُكُم بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ مِنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Waambie: Ni nani anaye kuhifadhini na nakama zake wakati wa usiku na mchana, na akakurehemuni na kukuneemesheni? Hapana awezae hayo. Lakini wao wanaipuuza Qur'ani ambayo ndiyo inawakumbusha ya kuwafaa na kuwalinda na adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul man yakla-ukum bi-al-layli wal-nahāri mina al-raḥmāni bal hum ʿan dhik'ri rabbihim muʿ'riḍūna
